title: Web Scraping based on keywords
snippet:
I have 11,000 keywords (names & addresses in a spreadsheet).  I need a programatic way of:

1) Searching for the names & addresses to get a website (something like Google API search)
2) Go to the first and second webpage match.
3) Look at the webpage for email, phone number, and fax number (likely through a regex on the webpage content)
